name: Felt alone, so I went for a walk
name_original: Felt alone, so I went for a walk
description:
This is our submission for the CGD Jam 2022. 

Felt alone, so I went for a walk is a game about feeling better and reminiscing. Take a walk through the forest, discover your past and keep your flame close!  Take the time to explore and ponder what there once was and was not in this narrative (short & unfinished) game. 



- WASD for moving
- E to interact
- Esc for menu

  • Kira (shinykiwi) - artist
  • Tuana (Tuana) - artist
  • Elijah (Floodgate Flugelhorn) - programmer
  • Percy (Percy) - game designer
  • Ben (signatured)  - game designer & sound**

**Music by In Love with a Ghost (free to use with credit)
https://twitter.com/lvghstmusic?lang=en

Note: This project was just for fun. Not eligible for winning or prizes because we are the organizers.
